ZMap Changes/Fixes [from cvs]
  • Browse CVS
  • doc/Release_notes/release_notes.2009_01_09.shtml: new zmap release notes for 9 January 2009
  • src/include/ZMap/zmapWebPages.h: update release notes file to release_notes.2009_01_09.shtml
  • doc/Release_notes/LAST_RELEASE_DATE.txt: update last release notes to 09/01/2009
  • src/zmapUtils/zmapUtils_P.h: /var/tmp/zmap.21614/ZMap/scripts/versioner run by zmap

  • src/: include/ZMap/zmapUtilsGUI.h, zmapUtils/zmapGUIutils.c: add code to message funcs to allow timeout for modal dialogs + add non-modal blocking dialog code.
  • src/runconfig: Add -fPIC to resolve issue building X11::XRemote on 64bit machines
  • src/zmapDocs/ZMapMainPage.c: update version number and author information.
  • src/zmapWindow/zmapWindowNavigator.c: Attempt at a fix for RT ticket # 95659. Needs more testing...
  • src/zmapView/zmapViewRemoteReceive.c: Fix for RT ticket # 95659. The Locus features being edited (when saving transcripts) were using feature->type not style->mode. New code copies style->mode into feature->type if style has mode. zMapFeatureAnyForceStyleMode should catch the rest...
